title: Introducing: HÅN
body:
It’s been a little while since I last shared the music of an Italian artist, hence my excitement at hearing **HÅN** and her spellbinding debut, _The Children_.

Hailing from near [Lake Garda](http://www.visitgarda.com/en/garda_lake/), her first outing is as majestic as the scenery of the area, recalling the likes of Daughter and second album Ben Howard (which I utterly adore). Clocking in at under three minutes, one can’t help but feel like it’s all over slightly too soon, however if that’s not a way to keep a listener on the edge of their seat for more, then I don’t know what is. Check out The Children below.
